name: Gemini AI Tools Test
description: Comprehensive test workflow demonstrating all Gemini AI advanced features

stages.title: Test Title
stages.description: Enter a title for this test session

stages.title: Grounding with Google Search
stages.description: Test Google Search grounding. Ask a question about current events or recent information.
stages.promptTemplate:
Using Google Search grounding, answer this question: {{userInput}}

Provide sources and citations for your answer.

stages.title: Grounding with URL Context
stages.description: Test URL grounding. Enter a URL to analyze its content.
stages.promptTemplate: Analyze the content from {{userInput.url}} and answer: {{userInput.question}}

stages.title: Thinking Mode Test
stages.description: Test thinking mode with a complex reasoning task
stages.promptTemplate: Solve this problem step by step: {{userInput}}

stages.title: Function Calling - Calculator
stages.description: Test function calling with calculator tool. Try: 'What is 25 * 37 + 156 / 4?'
stages.promptTemplate:
{{userInput}}

Use the calculator tool to solve any mathematical operations needed.

stages.title: Function Calling - Weather
stages.description: Test weather tool. Try: 'What's the weather in New York and London?'
stages.promptTemplate:
{{userInput}}

Use the weather tool to get weather information for any locations mentioned.

stages.title: Function Calling - Unit Converter
stages.description: Test unit conversion. Try: 'Convert 100 kilometers to miles and 72 fahrenheit to celsius'
stages.promptTemplate:
{{userInput}}

Use the unit converter tool for any unit conversions needed.

stages.title: Code Execution - Python
stages.description: Test Python code execution. Try: 'Create a bar chart of sales data: Q1=100, Q2=150, Q3=120, Q4=180'
stages.promptTemplate:
{{userInput}}

Write and execute Python code to accomplish this task. If creating visualizations, use matplotlib.

stages.title: Streaming Response Test
stages.description: Test streaming responses. Ask for a long, detailed explanation.

stages.title: Chat Mode Test
stages.description: Test multi-turn chat. Have a conversation!
stages.systemInstructions: You are a helpful AI assistant in a test environment. Be conversational and remember context from previous messages.

stages.title: Image Understanding Test
stages.description: Upload an image to test image understanding capabilities
stages.promptTemplate:
Analyze this image in detail. Provide a JSON response with:
1. 'description': Overall description
2. 'objects': Array of identified objects
3. 'text': Any text found in the image
4. 'colors': Dominant colors
5. 'mood': The mood or atmosphere

stages.title: Document Understanding Test
stages.description: Upload a document (PDF, DOCX, TXT) to test document understanding
stages.promptTemplate:
Analyze this document and provide a JSON summary with:
1. 'title': Document title or main topic
2. 'summary': Brief summary
3. 'keyPoints': Array of key points
4. 'wordCount': Approximate word count
5. 'language': Primary language

stages.title: Combined Features Test
stages.description: Test multiple features together: grounding + function calling + code execution
stages.promptTemplate:
{{userInput}}

Use any combination of search, tools, and code execution to provide a comprehensive answer.

stages.title: Test Summary
stages.description: AI will summarize all the tests performed
